data.eml:eml: The first Middle Jurassic Protobrachyceron Handlirsch fly (Diptera: Brachycera: Protobrachyceridae) from Inner Mongolia (China)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Kuiyan, Yang, Ding, Ren, Dong (2008): The first Middle Jurassic Protobrachyceron Handlirsch fly (Diptera: Brachycera: Protobrachyceridae) from Inner Mongolia (China). Zootaxa 1879: 61-64, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.184177
